name: Call of Monkeys
description:
You have been lost in the jungle invaded by a number of
mischievous monkeys. You have no other way out than to defeat
and shoot as many monkeys as possible before they knock you down.

Input Controlls:

  • Press the "r" button on your keyboard to reload fruit and left click to shoot it
  • Be careful because you are nervous being on top of trees and your energy will gradually weaken. Monitor your energy once you have recharged the fruit by pressing "q". If your energy is very low, you won't jump. Hit, jump and eat. Simple and frenetic!
  • You can jump very high between branches by holding the jump button "space". The longer you press the higher you get.

Sounds too simple? Well, try the different difficulty modes on settings menu that we have prepared for more experienced players
